headline: WILD FULLY AUTOMATIC CAMERA SYSTEM
description: Fully Automatic Camera System    Currently configured for Polaroid 4 x 5 photos, but may be used for 35mm photography with appropriate accessories.
keywords: controls polaroid ccd 35mm adaptor wild zeiss
specstable:

Model MPS51S
Description Automatic Camera System
Camera
Type Polaroid 4x5
Accessories

  • Spot-metering feature
  • Motorized film advance
  • Uses conventional 4x5 and Polaroid sheet/pack film holders
